message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of it right now, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me.  I'm confident that with your expertise, you can unlock even greater potential.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000.  This price reflects the significant value I see in the product, and I believe it represents a fair deal for both of us. Let me know your thoughts.
